docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO'S Crandon Institute was on the air a short time ago with an oratorical contest headed "The  Mission of America." The contending college was Ward's in Buenos Aires. Each address was given in English and in Spanish.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO'S Crandon Institute was on the air a short time ago with an oratorical contest headed "The Mission of America." The contending college was Ward's in Buenos Aires. Each address was given in English and in Spanish.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Nov. 9--Uruguay and the United States have reached an agreement for the establishment of naval and air bases on the Uruguayan coast.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Nov. 9--Uruguay and the United States have reached an agreement for the establishment of naval and air bases on the Uruguayan coast.

headline.main: URUGUAYANS AGREE TO ALLOW US BASES; They Will Be Pan-American Rather Than for U.S. Alone --To House Ships, Planes

byline.original: By JOHN W. WHITE Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Albert V. Moore, president of Moore-McCormack Lines, announced yesterday that launching plans for four new passenger-cargo vessels had been completed and that the company had decided to depart for the first time from its traditional naming system.
docs.lead_paragraph: Albert V. Moore, president of Moore-McCormack Lines, announced yesterday that launching plans for four new passenger-cargo vessels had been completed and that the company had decided to depart for the first time from its traditional naming system.

headline.main: MOORE-M'CORMACK TO LAUNCH 4 SHIPS; First of the Passenger-Cargo Liners to Go Down Ways at Chester, Pa., Nov. 27

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Nov. 10--Diplomats and other political observers in South American capitals believe than the cause of democracy throughout the continent will be greatly strengthened by the establishment of naval and air bases at strategic points open to...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Nov. 10--Diplomats and other political observers in South American capitals believe than the cause of democracy throughout the continent will be greatly strengthened by the establishment of naval and air bases at strategic points open to use by the armed forces of any American nation engaged in defending this hemisphere as now being worked out between the United States and various South American governments.

headline.main: CALL LATIN BASES AID TO DEMOCRACY; South American Observers Say Program Bolsters Free Rule Throughout Continent SOVEREIGNTY HELD SAFE Anti-Nazi Drives Strengthened by Cabinet Reorganizations in Several Republics

byline.original: By JOHN W. WHITE Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Repeating a warning he issued a year ago when the European war was only two months old, Postmaster Albert Goldman urged the public yesterday to dispatch Christmas mail for European countries as early as possible to enable it to reach the recipients...
docs.lead_paragraph: Repeating a warning he issued a year ago when the European war was only two months old, Postmaster Albert Goldman urged the public yesterday to dispatch Christmas mail for European countries as early as possible to enable it to reach the recipients in time for the holidays.

headline.main: SEA-BORNE MAILS FOR YULE LISTED; Goldman Warns of Uncertainty of Transportation to Europe, but Gives Other Schedules EARLY POSTING IS URGED Latest Dates for Dispatch to South America, West Indies and Newfoundland Given

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Nov. 11--The Uruguayan Ministry of Foreign Affairs issued the following official communique tonight in relation to the establishment in its territory of naval bases by other American countries:
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Nov. 11--The Uruguayan Ministry of Foreign Affairs issued the following official communique tonight in relation to the establishment in its territory of naval bases by other American countries:

headline.main: URUGUAY DECLARES BASES ARE ITS OWN; No Foreign Power Will Have Control of Defense Projects, Ministry InsistsAT DISPOSAL OF AMERICASFacilities Will Be Turned Overif Needed for Group Action,Communique Says

headline.main: MONTEVIDEO LOSES HOTEL; Lanata, Famous for 30 Years, Yields to Modern Competition
